00203 /* Exact-width types. WG14/N843 C99 Standard, Section 7.18.1.1 */
00204 typedef signed   char  int8_t;
00205 typedef signed   short int16_t;
00206 typedef signed   long  int32_t;
00207 typedef unsigned char  uint8_t;
00208 typedef unsigned short uint16_t;
00209 typedef unsigned long  uint32_t;
